product_name: White Sierra Kool Multifunctional Headwear - Special Buy
long_description: The tubular stretch-knit Kool Multifunctional Headwear from White Sierra can be worn a dozen different ways and protects you from harmful UV rays, dust and insects on your outdoor adventures. Polyester-microfiber knit tube can be worn as a neck gaiter, mouth-and-nose shield, hair band, skull cap and wrist band and in many other configurations. Fabric wicks away sweat or wipes up spills and dries quickly; offers UVA/UVB and antimicrobial protection. Insect Shield(R) technology repels mosquitoes (including those carrying West Nile virus and malaria), ticks, ants, flies, chiggers and midges or no-see-ums. Insect Shield uses permethrin which is a man-made version of a natural insect repellent found in a type of chrysanthemum plant; it's odorless and invisible. White Sierra Kool Multifunctional Headwear packs flat or folds up in your pocket for travel. Special buy.
short_description: The tubular stretch-knit Kool Multifunctional Headwear from White Sierra can be worn a dozen different ways and protects you from harmful UV rays, dust and insects on your outdoor adventures.
